name: Memkind
body:
### Welcome to memkind.

Few useful links:
* Based on memkind man pages:
  * [memkind API](http://memkind.github.io/memkind/man_pages/memkind.html)
  * [hbwmalloc API](http://memkind.github.io/memkind/man_pages/hbwmalloc.html)
* [Architecture document](http://memkind.github.io/memkind/memkind_arch_20150318.pdf) 

For source and binary RPMs of latest tagged release from OpenSuSE builds: 
[http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/cmcantalupo/](http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/cmcantalupo/)

Please join the memkind mailing list: 
[https://lists.01.org/mailman/listinfo/memkind](https://lists.01.org/mailman/listinfo/memkind)

Packages available from Fedora: EPEL 7, Fedroa 21, Fedora 22

For access to the latest code, clone the git repos (primarily for developers).
```
$ git clone https://github.com/memkind/memkind.git
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
